title: U.S. Transfers 6 Guant√°namo Detainees to Uruguay
teaser: The Defense Department announced Sunday that six men being held at Guantanamo Bay prison have been transferred to Uruguay. NPR's Arun Rath talks to Charlie Savage of the New York Times.
